title: sound signals emitted
extract: Sound signals used on the waterways are like the turn light indicators used to signal intentions on the highways. ... Sound signals are composed of short and prolonged blasts and must be audible for at least one-half mile: Short blast—about one second in duration.
extract_html: Sound signals used on the waterways are like the turn light indicators used to signal intentions on the highways. ... Sound signals are composed of short and prolonged blasts and must be audible for at least one-half mile: Short blast—about one second in duration.
